org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics.repository

Interface MetricRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CounterWriter, GaugeWriter, MetricReader, MetricWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryMetricRepository, RedisMetricRepository

    public interface MetricRepository
extends MetricReader, MetricWriter
    Convenient combination of reader and writer concerns.
    Author:
    Dave Syer
